name: Who Is This? Trivia
description:
This is a picture trivia game.
Recommended for those who know a lot of history and who are familiar with famous people
from the past.
In this app you will see a portrait of a famous historical person and you will have to fill in 
the blanks with his/her name.
The first name is given and you just have to fill in the middle and or last name. The selection of letters below the blank boxes will give you a hint. 

These are people you may or may not have heard of, but some of them you may be
familiar with.
They all made and became history in their own unique way. Hints are of course enabled.
